thread.section_title: Buying Business Travel | For Business, Corporate Travel & Meeting Buyers & Arrangers
thread.title: Airplus joins GTMC

title: Airplus joins GTMC
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Wed, 30 Sep 2015 17:39 Follow @thomasnewcombe Travel payment provider Airplus International has joined the GTMC as an industry partner.
Airplus International specialises in travel payments and delivers payment solutions to corporate clients across the globe.
The company said it processes around 145 million transactions every year with an invoicing value of €11.8 billion. The payment specialist business is one of several organisations that are partners to the GTMC.
As a partner they have exclusive access to the GTMCs industry leading strategy groups and the member TMC organisations that represent the best of the UK’s business travel sector.
GTMC chief executive Paul Wait: “The GTMC values its relationships with industry partners and we are pleased that Airplus International recognises that the GTMC is the most relevant route to reaching other industry professionals.”
